document.full_text: luxury car makers that have learned the ropes in the familiar markets of europe and the united states are having to adapt to new ways in china, but with the market expected to boom, they have little choice but to get on board.
document.title: china premium car market prize worth the hurdles
lines_and_colors: luxury car makers that have learned the ropes in the familiar markets of europe and the united states are having to adapt to new ways in china, but with the market expected to boom, they have little choice but to get on board.
